record.title: APPOINTMENT
record.chair: The Chair, on behalf of the President pro tempore, pursuant to Public Law 95-521, appoints Morgan J. Frankel, of the District of Columbia, as Senate legal counsel, for a term of service to expire at the end of the 111th Congress.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, has the Chair appointed Mr. Frankel?

record.chair: Yes, the Chair has appointed Mr. Frankel.
